summary: The diff implements all four mobile optimization requirements (REQ-7 through REQ-10) with comprehensive changes across App.tsx, Sidebar.tsx, Header.tsx, MessageInput.tsx, ChatArea.tsx, MessageList.tsx, SessionItem.tsx, LoginScreen.tsx, ProfileSetupModal.tsx, DeleteSessionDialog.tsx, Message.tsx, EmptyState.tsx, LoginButton.tsx, and index.css. All major acceptance criteria appear to be addressed.
